background_description: The background consists of dry, sandy earth mixed with numerous small to medium-sized pebbles and rocks of various colors, including grey, white, reddish-brown, and darker grey. Patches of green leafy vegetation are sparsely distributed, casting shadows on the ground, adding to the visual complexity of the environment.
camouflage_type: Color blending / Pattern matching / Shadow hiding
explanation: The lizard exhibits excellent camouflage by blending almost seamlessly with its arid, rocky environment. Its skin coloration, a mottled mix of browns, greys, and some lighter speckles, perfectly matches the sandy soil and the varied hues of the small rocks and pebbles surrounding it. The patterns on its skin mimic the granular texture of the ground and the irregular shapes of the stones. Furthermore, the lizard is positioned partly within a shadowy area cast by a nearby plant, which helps to obscure its outline and reduces its contrast against the background. This combination of color blending, pattern matching, and utilizing shadows makes it very difficult to spot at first glance.
